intro.title: Color Personality Test
intro.subtitle: If your personality could be a color, what would it be?
intro.description: Discover your personality type with 12 insightful questions.
intro.description_2: Find which of the 8 color personality types best represents you!

button.premium: Watch Ad for AI Deep Analysis

q1.text: How do you usually make decisions?

q3.text: How do you think others perceive you?

q4.text: How do you face new challenges?

q6.text: How do you react to failure?

q9.text: How do you prefer to travel?

red.name: Red - The Passionate
red.tagline: You achieve everything with fiery passion
red.description: You have a passionate and bold personality. With endless energy, you can achieve any goal and lead naturally. You embrace new challenges fearlessly and cherish living in the present moment.
red.meaning: Passion, Energy, Courage, Leadership, Activity, Strong Will
red.deepAnalysis: You are a natural leader. Your energy inspires everyone around you and makes the impossible possible. Your drive is invaluable, but adding thoughtful planning will make you an even greater leader.

blue.name: Blue - The Intellectual
blue.tagline: Understanding the world through deep reflection
blue.description: You are calm and thoughtful, seeking stability and security. Your analytical thinking solves problems effectively, and your reliability earns trust from those around you.
blue.meaning: Tranquility, Trust, Depth, Wisdom, Stability, Composure
blue.deepAnalysis: You are a true philosopher. Your calm analysis clarifies complex situations, and your stability is a precious asset. Balance your thoughts with action to manifest your ideas in reality.

green.name: Green - The Harmonizer
green.tagline: Healing the world with harmony and balance
green.description: You are peaceful and seek harmony. You understand others' emotions and show deep compassion. You prefer a stable, balanced life and bring comfort to those around you.
green.meaning: Peace, Healing, Harmony, Consideration, Balance, Naturalness
green.deepAnalysis: You are a natural mediator. Your empathy heals many hearts, and your presence brings peace. Don't forget that your needs matter too. Balance caring for others with caring for yourself.

yellow.name: Yellow - The Optimist
yellow.tagline: Brightening everything with positivity like the sun
yellow.description: You are bright and optimistic. Your positive attitude lights up everyone around you and you excel at finding joy. Your friendly nature helps you build good relationships with many people.
yellow.meaning: Optimism, Hope, Brightness, Friendliness, Positivity, Vitality
yellow.deepAnalysis: You are a beacon of positivity. Your brightness makes the world warmer for everyone. While your optimism is precious, embrace life's challenges too to grow deeper.

purple.name: Purple - The Creator
purple.tagline: Drawing new worlds with unique imagination
purple.description: You are creative with a rich imagination. You see the world uniquely, with high artistic sensitivity. You are a free spirit not bound by tradition.
purple.meaning: Creativity, Imagination, Mystery, Individuality, Artistry, Innovation
purple.deepAnalysis: You are a true artist. Your imagination is infinite and inspires many. Balance your creativity with practical planning to bring your dreams to reality.

orange.name: Orange - The Energizer
orange.tagline: Living freely with vibrant energy in each moment
orange.description: You are energetic and vivid. You love new experiences and have the ability to fully enjoy the present. You are sociable, flexible, and bring vitality to everyone around you.
orange.meaning: Vitality, Freedom, Immediacy, Passion, Flexibility, Liveliness
orange.deepAnalysis: You are a true spirit of freedom. Your vibrant energy makes everything enjoyable. Balance living in the moment with working toward future goals for a richer life.

pink.name: Pink - The Empath
pink.description: You are emotionally rich and highly sensitive. You care deeply for those around you with warm consideration. Your emotional expression is abundant and you read others' feelings well.
pink.meaning: Emotion, Compassion, Warmth, Sensitivity, Delicacy, Inner Beauty
pink.deepAnalysis: You are a true artist of emotion. Your sensitivity touches many hearts and your care moves people deeply. Balance your emotional openness with rational judgment to become stronger.

white.name: White - The Pure
white.tagline: The great capacity to embrace everything
white.description: You have a pure and open heart. You accept everyone warmly and try to understand without judgment. You seek genuineness and honesty, harmonizing with all colors and people.
white.meaning: Purity, Completion, Neutrality, Tranquility, Inclusivity, Beginning
white.deepAnalysis: You are a true sage. Your openness and inclusivity comfort everyone, and your honesty earns trust. Remember to value yourself too, and express your opinions confidently. Your authentic self is most beautiful.
